articles.author: Ryan Gaydos
articles.title: Cardinals' Kyler Murray teased over odd piece of football equipment at training camp
articles.description: Arizona Cardinals star Kyler Murray faced ridicule over the weekend as he was teased for wearing what appeared to be a "sports bra." But it was much more than that.
articles.content:
Kyler Murray may be able to avoid defenses for a few more weeks as he recovers from a torn ACL, but he was unable to sidestep criticism over his practice outfit.
